attributes.action: Make ALL doctors aware of government legislation about Fibromyalgia
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: All doctors seem to have different theorys regarding Fibromyalgia.Rangeing from"its all in your head"to being really supportive.All doctors should be made aware that Fibromyalgia is a very painful and disableing condition that changes the lives of sufferers completely and the added stress of dealing with doctors who refuse to help or understand can actually make the symptoms worse leading to more pain and distress.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
